title: Within You
description: What does it take to love, when all is broken?London, 2159. A society divided in two.Maya has left the shelter of the inner city bubble of the Zone, searching for the truth. What is life really like out here, in the Ring? But what she finds instead is him: her boss at the pub where she finds work, Juan.Maya is instantly drawn to the guarded, enigmatic man. And maybe Juan is not as indifferent as he seems. But he is hiding something, and Maya has her own past to hold at bay.In a world where strength equals survival, their secrets could unravel the fragile trust between them â€“ and their very existence.
author: Amber Night
